name: shoppinglist_web_app
description: A full-stack **Shopping List System** that allows users to **register, log in, and manage their shopping items** securely. Users can add, update, delete, and mark items as purchased. Built with the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with JWT-based authentication.

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
